Module FYPManager
Package controllers

Class StudentRequestManager

java.lang.Object
controllers.StudentRequestManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStudentRequestManager
public class StudentRequestManager extends Object implements IStudentRequestManager
This class manages the requests made by students. It implements the IStudentRequestManager interface.

      public boolean checkPending(Student s, RequestType rt)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
